credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Three Red Beatles
medium: graphite | ink | white ink | on paper
inscriptions: u.c. in ink: THREE RED BEETLES [crossed out, second letter E in 'Beetles' is written over in pencil with an 'A']; l.r. in ink: RUBE/GOLDBER.; l.c. in pencil: 7 1/4" wide/ [crossed out, illegible word]; l.r. in pencil: 4644 [crossed out]; l.r. in pencil: 491; veso u.r.: [remenant of old pink label]; verso c. in pencil: 4644; verso l.l. in pencil: 116[encircled]; verso l.r. in pencil: 56[encircled]
